name: Refactor-Color-Scheme
description:
A simple colorscheme made with the help of http://yukihiro.nakadaira.googlepages.com/vim-color.html
and based on the color scheme used in the snippet code of http://refactormycode.com/

Enjoy!
install_details:
Put it in the ~/.vim/colors folder an then load it with 
:colorscheme refactor 
or by putting 
colorscheme refactor
on your [g]vimrc file
